name: Guƞgoƞ
description: A large cylindrical laced double-headed membranophone played in most Dagbama ensembles.

name: Kalamboo
description: A transverse aerophone made from cane consisting of four tone holes.

name: Luƞa
description: A double-headed hourglass drum played under the armpit with a stick.

name: Saɣyelim
description: A pair of woven basket shakers.
